title: Director, Engineering - Databricks Mosaic AI
shortDescription:
- Lead teams building Mosaic AI products at the NYC AI Engineering Hub.
- Partner with product and research to launch and scale ML/GenAI capabilities for enterprise customers.
- Define the future of AI and data applications on the Databricks platform.
fitRationale:
- High-signal AI platform leadership role with enterprise adoption impact.
- Strong fit for your narrative on governed, scalable AI delivery across data platforms.
- Cross-functional product + research alignment mirrors your context-graph and platform strategy work.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Define the architectural vision and prioritize platform-level technology investments for a SaaS platform.
- Establish/enforce architecture standards, policies, and best practices across engineering/IT/security.
- Architect AI/ML systems with governance, model lifecycle management, and responsible AI principles.
- Modernize cloud-native architecture, including data platforms supporting AI/ML workloads at scale.
fitRationale:
- Direct hit on governance + responsible AI + cross-domain architecture leadership (engineering/IT/security).
- Strong platform modernization scope that maps to your enterprise platform + compliance positioning.
- Clean story for ‘trusted AI’ (fairness/transparency/privacy) without being a pure research role.

title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Unify and modernize a 17+ product portfolio into a single scalable, cloud-first, AI-enabled platform.
- Lead a globally distributed engineering org (150–500+ engineers) across multiple hubs (US/India/Europe).
- Drive platform simplification, engineering KPIs/operating cadence, and cost/quality improvements in a PE-backed environment.
- Customer-facing with enterprise accounts; support future M&A diligence and integrations.
fitRationale:
- Strong match to platform consolidation + architecture governance + operating-model work at scale.
- AI-enabled platform shift + multi-product unification is a clean ‘enterprise transformation’ narrative.
- PE value-creation framing (cost/velocity/quality) aligns with ‘trust + performance at scale’ execution discipline.

title: Senior Vice President of Data & Infrastructure
shortDescription:
- Report to CTO; oversee 80–100 engineers across data infrastructure (ingestion, prediction, measurement, exchanges).
- Own build/buy/partner strategy for data + infra; drive impact across ambiguous problem spaces.
- Lead a US-based remote engineering org with strong cross-functional collaboration.
- Healthcare context implies high governance/privacy requirements.
fitRationale:
- Very aligned to enterprise data platform leadership + AI/analytics enablement at org scale.
- Strong ‘data as product’ leadership role with room to shape governance, standards, and execution rigor.
- Regulated domain (healthcare) matches your governance/compliance focus.

title: Sr. Director, Data Platform Engineering & Operations
shortDescription:
- Lead SIE’s data + AI platform ecosystem (streaming/ingestion/warehouse, governance/observability).
- Operate at massive scale (millions of users; billions of data points/day).
- Stack mentions: Kafka, Databricks, Snowflake; governance tools (Alation/Collibra).
- Bay Area role (San Mateo).
fitRationale:
- Enterprise-scale data/platform leadership with explicit governance + observability responsibilities.
- Strong bridge to AI platform strategy (Databricks/Snowflake + AI/ML adoption).
- Big-org cross-functional leadership very close to your current operating environment.
